Cannabis 101

An introduction to the plant, cannabinoids like THC and CBD, and common forms such as flower, concentrates, and edibles.

Onset & dosing basics

Start low and go slow. Inhaled products act quickly, while edibles may take up to two hours to take effect.

Safety & responsibility

Do not drive under the influence. Keep cannabis secure and away from children and pets.

Buying in Colorado

You must be 21+ with a valid government ID. Local rules vary and shipping is not allowed.
